verbose_text: Using the TUNEL assay and analysing the activity of caspase 3/7, our results proved that activated FOXO3 induced by HIV-1 Tat triggered the apoptosis of SH-SY5Y cells by regulating the expression Bim and Bcl-2.
evidence: FOXO3 induced by HIV-1 Tat triggered the apoptosis of SH-SY5Y cells by regulating the expression Bim
